name: real-estate-website
description: Modern real estate website with MLS integration

scripts.check-node-version: node -e "const current=process.versions.node.split('.')[0];const required=18;if(current<required){console.error('Error: Node.js version '+required+' or higher is required. Current version: '+process.versions.node);process.exit(1);}"
scripts.check-npm-version: node -e "const cp=require('child_process');const current=cp.execSync('npm --version').toString().trim().split('.')[0];const required=9;if(current<required){console.error('Error: npm version '+required+' or higher is required. Current version: '+cp.execSync('npm --version').toString().trim());process.exit(1);}"
scripts.preinstall: npm run check-node-version && npm run check-npm-version
scripts.build: cd client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install --production
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.production:setup: npm run setup:env && npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install --include=dev
scripts.production:build: npm run production:setup && npm run build
